voice.text: Passages to Carlin, Ab Dendriel, Edron, Venore, Port Hope, Goroma, Pyre, Oken, Gengia, Farmine, Zao, Darashia, Ankrahmun, Liberty Bay, Cormaya, Yalahar, Zenit, Vinea, Ilania and Svargrond.

parameter.value: Hello |PLAYERNAME|. I can take you to: {Carlin}, {Ab} {Dendriel}, {Edron}, {Venore}, {Port} {Hope}, {Goroma}, {Pyre}, {Oken}, {Gengia}, {Farmine}, {Zao} {Darashia}, {Ankrahmun}, {Liberty} {Bay}, {Cormaya}, {Yalahar}, {Zenit}, {Vinea}, {Ilania} and {Svargrond} for free.
